      • validateSignature

        public ReportsDTO validateSignature(DataToValidateDTO dataToValidate)
        Description copied from interface: RestDocumentValidationService
        This method returns the result of the validation of the signed file. The results contains a Diagnostic Data, a simple report and a detailed report
        Specified by:
        validateSignature in interface RestDocumentValidationService
        Parameters:
        dataToValidate - a DataToValidateDTO which contains the signature, the optional original document(s) and the optional validation policy
        Returns:
        a ReportsDTO with the 3 reports : the diagnostic data, the detailed report and the simple report

      • getOriginalDocuments

        public List<RemoteDocument> getOriginalDocuments(DataToValidateDTO dataToValidate)
        Description copied from interface: RestDocumentValidationService
        This method returns the original document(s) for the given signed file and optionally the signatureId.
        Specified by:
        getOriginalDocuments in interface RestDocumentValidationService
        Parameters:
        dataToValidate - a DataToValidateDTO which contains the signature, the optional original document and the optional signatureId
        Returns:
        a List of RemoteDocument
